import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Hero } from '../../interfaces/hero.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'heroes-hero-card', templateUrl: './card.component.html' }) export class CardComponent implements OnInit { @Input() public hero!: Hero ngOnInit(){ if(!this.hero) throw Error('Hero property is required') } } {{hero.superhero}} {{hero.alter_ego}}
